name: SIRTI Società per Azioni
goal: Sirti S.p.A. is a Italian large industrial company, supplier of engineering solutions for the Telecommunication, ICT and Railway infrastructures. SIRTI develops innovative solutions for various markets worldwide, including railway transportation systems, telecommunications, energy, ICT and all those which require a network infrastructure.
euInitiatives: Initiative of support to Research and Development of new technologies and products to improve competitiveness
